alert.note: Alert for Fentress; Overton; Pickett; Putnam (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 1:00PM CST until March 03 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Pickett County in Middle Tennessee... East central Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Fentress County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1259 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Livingston, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Livingston, Jamestown, Byrdstown, Monterey, Allardt, Grimsley, Crawford, Pickett State Park and Pall Mall. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 298 and 302. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
